Package ibis.server

The ibis-server is a server which contains multiple services needed to run ibis applications.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Service Interface for an Ibis Service.
 

Class Summary
Client Convenience class to retrieve information on the server, and create a suitable VirtualSocketFactory.
Server Main Ibis Server class.
ServerProperties Properties valid for the Ibis server
 

Package ibis.server Description

The ibis-server is a server which contains multiple services needed to run ibis applications. It can also be used seperately
